name: water-veil
caption: Water Veil

effect.full:
This Pokémon cannot be [burned]{mechanic:burn}.

If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavorText:
The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which
prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
